entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
